Uses of Interface
net.finmath.time.businessdaycalendar.BusinessdayCalendarInterface

  • Packages that use BusinessdayCalendarInterface 
    Package Description
    net.finmath.marketdata.model.curves
    Provides interface specification and implementation of curves, e.g., interest rate curves like discount curves and forward curves.
    net.finmath.time
    Provides interfaces and classes for time discretizations, tenors and (swap) schedule generation.
    net.finmath.time.businessdaycalendar  

    • Uses of BusinessdayCalendarInterface in net.finmath.marketdata.model.curves

    • Uses of BusinessdayCalendarInterface in net.finmath.time.businessdaycalendar

      Classes in net.finmath.time.businessdaycalendar that implement BusinessdayCalendarInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BusinessdayCalendar
      Base class for all business day calendars.
      class  BusinessdayCalendarAny
      A business day calendar, where every day is a business day.
      class  BusinessdayCalendarExcludingTARGETHolidays
      A business day calendar, where every day is a business day, expect the TARGET holidays.
      class  BusinessdayCalendarExcludingWeekends
      A business day calendar, where every day is a business day, expect SATURDAY and SUNDAY.
      Constructors in net.finmath.time.businessdaycalendar with parameters of type BusinessdayCalendarInterface 
      Constructor and Description
      BusinessdayCalendarExcludingTARGETHolidays(BusinessdayCalendarInterface baseCalendar)
      Create business day calendar using a given business day calendar as basis.
      BusinessdayCalendarExcludingWeekends(BusinessdayCalendarInterface baseCalendar)
      Create business day calendar using a given business day calendar as basis.
